metadata.Title: CVE-2023-42114 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: [Exim NTLM Challenge Out-Of-Bounds Read Information Disclosure Vulnerability]

notes.Note: eslerm> no security patches available, see ZDI's timeline allenpthuang> patches now available, see the thread on Openwall

criterions.comment: exim4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
